description: This file defines the AuthService class responsible for user authentication tasks such as registration, login, and logout, using the Dio HTTP client and custom storage helpers.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Service class providing authentication functionalities such as register, login, and logout.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and name, returning a User object on success.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password, stores JWT token and user info, returns User object.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clearing stored data and resetting API client.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles errors from DioException, extracting message details.
